arStrings.szText: Well, now we know where the werewolf problem came from. We may be able to reverse it, if I can count on your help.
First, you need to find that wolf totem. We also need "blood of the ally" and "blood of the enemy." You'll find druid ritual totems in the Harrowfields and Wraithstead.
Perform the ritual at each for the blood. I'll gather the rest of what we need and meet you back at Wraithstead.
